name: Our Dying World (TheRealTron)
description:
Our Dying World is a JRPG-inspired game made using the RPG Maker software. Follow Max and his friend Ryker as they try to grow in strength by setting off from their home village to become adventurers! Our Dying World is a story-driven experience in which you must find out why magic is slowly vanishing from Elorant.

All story cutscenes and battles are voice acted!

(Everything you see is subject to change in the future.)

Discord Link: https://discord.gg/6V7tVfU

Kickstarter page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/therealtron/our-dying-world

Twitter Link: https://twitter.com/ODWRPG

━━━ ❖ Features ❖━━━ 

Our Dying World is an action and story-turn-based game, with multiple playable characters and unique party compositions. 

  • It also features an item crafting system, in which players can craft useful things such as health or mana potions or even magical stones to use against enemies. 
  • The main story cutscenes are all fully voiced. The game also features impactful choices regarding your party members, where your actions with your decisions and how characters feel about each other matter. Choosing poorly could even lead to character death in the end game. 
  • This game also has unique sprites and character/cutscene art, as well as original music. 
  • Certain bosses also have engaging and inventive abilities, and there is a casino with function Blackjack and Slot Machines.
Meet the Party Members
